scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This addition to the Bruccoli Great War Collection consists of a pocket notebook, 1916-1918, kept by Corporal R.J. Bolingbroke, Signal Section, 16th Platoon, 5th N.F., British Expeditionary Forces. It contains notes on signals used by members of the Signal Corps, diagrams of "code time," a list of gravediggers, a list of grave plots in the Haringhe Military Cemetery in Belgium, a record of Bolingbroke's places of military service since his enlistment on September 14, 1914, and a recipe for "Beetroot Wine."
